scripts.install:backend: cd apps/backend && uv venv --python 3.13 && uv pip install .
scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.dev:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000 --timeout-keep-alive 300 --timeout-graceful-shutdown 300
scripts.build:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run python -c "print('Backend build complete')"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd apps/backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --port 8000
